item.title: Feature flag integration with Launch Darkly
item.description: In this post I will discuss on how to integrate feature flag with Launch Darkly. String name = "hello";

item.title: Managing Jupyter Notebooks on Cloud
item.description: Collaborative coding is one of the key component to build better software. Open source software like GitHub, is a community of 25 million members maintains their code and projects on the cloud. The question is - How can we manage our Data Science projects on the cloud, so that we can execute anywhere, anytime and can support cloning, sharing etc.. Jupyter notebook (previously iPython Notebook) is a popular open-source platform for doing Data Science, however for the local development the complete Data Science package including Jupyter can be downloaded from Anaconda distribution, which is local development.
